humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there is no metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph node and multiple (3) right axillary lymph nodes. This corresponds to New Rule 11, which states that N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that one sentinel lymph node and three additional axillary lymph nodes were excised and found to be negative for tumor (pN0). There is no evidence of lymphovascular involvement or carcinoma in situ component. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.
